description:
The protagonist, Bottom Biting Bug XVIII (age 10), loves to happily sing and dance more than anything else in the world. When bitten by a Bottom Biting Bug, people with hunched backs will have their posture corrected, depressed people will start to laugh, and people who had no confidence will suddenly become self-assured - those bitten are cheered up until they seem like entirely different people. However, even the Bottom Biting Bug makes many mistakes... This story featuring typical scenes from everyday life will continue to evolve through the sort of humor that kids love.
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
All the toothbrushes in town have been stolen overnight! The living of a Bottom Biting Bug depends on brushing his teeth, so it`s a real crisis if they can`t brush! B.B.B., Capline, Fatton, and Pak form a "biter detective team" to catch the thief!
Source: crunchyroll

As B.B.B. is preparing to go bug catching, Grandpa tells him that he was once called the bug catching king. He claims that he saw a bug of unbelievable proportions in the depths of the Amazon, but B.B.B. doesn`t believe him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: There It Is! The Monster Rhinoceros Beetle?!
出た, お化けカブトムシ!?

REGULAR.description:
Mr. Gab has been acting strangely all day. He`s talking about nothing but flowers, and flowers fill the classroom. It turns out he`s in love with the florist, Sacchan! He`s been going to the flower shop to see her every day, talking about flowers and buying them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ガブハチ先生, また恋!?

REGULAR.description:
The takoyaki shop run by Tasuke`s father, Ippei, isn`t very successful. But if he can make the ultimate takoyaki, maybe he`ll get more customers! So Ippei sets out to catch the legendary Great King Octopus (100 meters long, weighing 100 tons).
Source: crunchyroll

Tasuke`s class is performing "Cinderella" for the school play. Everyone`s idol, Sakura-san, is playing Cinderella, and purely by accident, Tasuke volunteers to play the prince! Tasuke has a habit of passing gas when he`s nervous, so he`s worried that he`ll ruin the play if it happens during the big proposal scene at the end.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 主役!? たーすけくん

REGULAR.description:
B.B.B. often forgets to bring things to school. Yet again today, he`s earned a "You fool!" from Mr. Gab. He absolutely can`t forget to bring his toothbrush for tomorrow`s class, not to mention the letter his mother wants him to mail, a book Capline wants to borrow, his homework, and lots of other things... so B.B.B. enacts a plan! Can he lose the habit of forgetting things?!
Source: crunchyroll

When B.B.B. asks if aliens really exist, his grandpa says "Of course they do." Intrigued, B.B.B. takes his friends to hunt for an alien. On the way to the top of Bottom Hill, where Grandpa said he has seen aliens before, they spot alien-like footprints, strange writing, and a ray gun?! Will B.B.B. and his friends find an alien?!
Source: crunchyroll

Gabriel`s family has arrived at B.B.B.`s house unannounced! His parents are trying to design a car aimed at commoners, so they`ve come to experience how B.B.B.`s family lives in hopes of better understanding commoners.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: おもてなし!? ガブレロ一家

REGULAR.description:
Pak`s bike still has training wheels. Capline tries to teach him how to ride without them, but Pak refuses and says stubbornly that he`ll learn on his own. Eager to help her brother who`s trying so hard, Capline tries giving him all sorts of advice in disguise.
Source: crunchyroll

Today`s class is about haiku, and the school principal, who loves haiku, is teaching in Mr. Gab`s place. After learning how haiku are composed, B.B.B. and the other students try making their own. The principal is moved by all of their haiku...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 俳句大好き!? 校長先生
